Javascript library¶

The Javascript version of athlib is lagging a little behind the Python.

hello(arg)¶

The hello functions is just here to test our build tools.

It turns out that sphinx-js doesn’t know a lot of ES6. To get function bodies documented here, declare them as this function is done. Don’t assign it to anyone.

normalizeGender(gender)¶

Takes common gender expressions and returns m or f

perfToFloat(perfText)¶

convert a performance (time or distance) to seconds or metres

calcUkaAgeGroup(birthDate, matchDate, category, vets, underAge)¶

Return the UK Athletics age group code for the athlete on match day

isFieldEvent(eventCode)¶

is this a field event code? HJ, PV, TJ, LJ etc

isMultiEvent(eventCode)¶

is this a multi-event code? DEC, PEN, HEP etc

betterPerformance(perfA, perfB, eventCode)¶

return the better of two performance strings. For running events, lower times are better For field events, greater numbers are better
